original: 扶風武功人，歷仕曹魏、西晉。晉武帝時，曾任近臣光祿大夫。後出任涼州刺史，於鮮卑大人禿髮樹機能叛亂時被擊敗，生死未知。
text: Fufeng Wugong man, Li Shi Cao Wei, Western Jin Dynasty. When Emperor Wu of Jin Dynasty, he served as Dr. Guanglu. Later, he served as the governor of Liangzhou, and was defeated during the rebellion of Master Yu Xianbei, life and death unknown.
